meaningMnemonic: You run into someone's <radical>forehead</radical> with your <radical>car</radical>. The big forehead you hit is Kim Jong Un's. You know that now you're going to have the whole North Korean <kanji>army</kanji> coming after you.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>army</kanji> is after you. Each army soldier has a <reading>gun</reading> (ぐん) and they want to use these guns of theirs to shoot you dead! You killed their leader with a car and now they’re gonna get you back with a gun!
